#summary The <column> Tag

= Introduction =

The `<column>` tag defines a column of elements.


= Details =

Every Nerdcules character sheet must have at least one `<column>` tag, which must appear inside of a [TagSet <set>] tag. Each `<column>` tag can have any number of [TagReference#Field_Tags field] tags.

== Example ==

{{{
<sheet>
  <head>
  </head>
  <set>
    <column>
    </column>
  </set>
</sheet>
}}}
